com.ge.predix.mobile.core

Class AndroidMobileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ge.predix.mobile.core.AndroidMobileManager

  • public class AndroidMobileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by 212460388. Copyright Â© 2016 GE. All rights reserved.

    This class is the Android representation of the MobileManager found in the JavaSDK. This class should be used on Android instead of the MobileManager. It contains analogous methods to the MobileManager and uses it internally. The MobileManager is the core of the Predix Mobile SDK system. It is the component used to bind your platform user interface to the internals of the SDK. Your container is responsible for providing a window or view where authentication, is loaded, and a separate window or view to load the PM web app into. The manager can be used to register custom services prior to startup. It can also be used to obtain the core component responsible for distributing notifications.

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        public static AndroidMobileManager instance

    • Method Detail

      • serviceRouter

        public ServiceRouter serviceRouter()
        Use this method to obtain an instance of the ServiceRouter which can be used to register additional Predix Mobile services. A Predix Mobile Service is a Java object that responds to an http://pmapi RESTful call. These objects are decorated with com.ge.predix.mobile.annotations.RequestMapping annotations that dictate which objects and methodsrespond to which RESTful calls.
        Returns:
        an instance of the ServiceRouter

      • start

        public void start()
           throws InitializationException
        This method starts the mobile manager and invokes the equivalent of a http://pmapi/boot/start REST command. Configuration is read in from the preferences and config files. The internal service router is instantiated and all core and custom services will be registered.
        Throws:
        InitializationException - Thrown if start is called when the manager is in the middle of stopping.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws InitializationException
        Throws:
        InitializationException

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()

      • instance

        @Deprecated
public static AndroidMobileManager instance(Context context,
                                                        ViewInterface viewInterface)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated use the instance field directly followed by a separate call to initialize. Use this method to obtain an instance of the AndroidMobileManager
        Parameters:
        context - An Android SDK Context object which is used internally by the SDK.
        viewInterface - A ViewInterface which is an abstraction around the component used to link Predix Mobile SDK behaviors to your application. It contains methods that allow you to bind an AuthHandler component, a com.ge.predix.mobile.platform.WindowView component, the platform's context and a system preferences component.
        Returns:
        an initialized instance of the AndroidMobileManager

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
                       ViewInterface viewInterface)
        Initializes the AndroidMobileManager instance with the given Android SDK Context and ViewInterface
        Parameters:
        context - An Android SDK Context object which is used internally by the SDK.
        viewInterface - A ViewInterface which is an abstraction around the component used to link Predix Mobile SDK behaviors to your application. It contains methods that allow you to bind an AuthHandler component, a com.ge.predix.mobile.platform.WindowView component, the platform's context and a system preferences component.
